title: Kimmel outlines next spring's PIFA 2016
text:
Stephan Salisbury, Posted: 
Kicking off April 8, the festival features the U.S. premiere of Article 13 
A collaboration between Compagnie Carabosse, from France, and Mexico's Teatro Linea de Sombra, Article 13 
April 8 and 13, the Philadelphia Chamber Music Society will present String Theory: Exploring the Nature, Craft and Soul of Musical Instruments 
At the Merriam Theater April 8-10, Sweden's Cirkus Cirkör will present the American premiere of Knitting Peace 
The Australian company Polyglot Theatre will bring Paper Planet 
On April 9, celebrated trumpeter Amir ElSaffar brings Rivers of Sound 
On the same date at the Kimmel's SEI Innovation Studio, Jazz Bridge, in collaboration with saxophonist Bobby Zankel, will present the world premiere of Vision Song: Our Hearts, Our Voices, Our Future 
April 10 at Verizon Hall sees the world premiere of Attack Point 
Los Angeles' Diavolo dance company brings its kinetic "Architecture in Motion" to the Merriam April 13-14, with two works, Fluid Infinities and Cubicle 
L.A. comedienne Kristina Wong performs The Wong Street Journal 
The American premiere of Concerto in Sea Major 
April 15-16, Chicago's Manual Cinema will present My Soul's Shadow , a cinematic shadow puppet installation based on Federico Garcí 
Global Artistry 
L.A.'s hip-hop dance troupe Antics brings Sneaker Suites 
Another world premiere, Mi Voca Su Voca 
On April 22, Holding It Down: The Veterans' Dreams Project 
PIFA officials said that more performances and organizations will be added over the next several months. For information consult the PIFA website,
